channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tom Brady on ‘dangerous’ Eagles, Can they repeat as Super Bowl champions? | The Herd
item.description: Tom Brady joins Colin Cowherd to discuss the Philadelphia Eagles’ struggles, strengths, and to ask if they can repeat as Super Bowl champions.

item.title: Tom Brady's 1 Take (or More) on Every Wild Card Matchup This Weekend
item.description: Which team does Tom Brady think is as "dangerous" as anyone? What do 49ers need to do to beat Eagles? Is it Super Bowl or bust for the Bills? Tom Brad...

item.title: Tom Brady on 49ers’ comeback struggles, Can Kyle Shanahan get over the hump? | The Herd
item.description: Kyle Shanahan is 12-44 when trailing at halftime, and the San Francisco 49ers play the Philadelphia Eagles this weekend in the NFC Wild Card. Tom Brad...

item.title: Touching Base: The Blue Jays Keeping Spending Big After World Series Heartbreak
item.description: After that heartbreaking finish to the 2025 World Series, the Blue Jays are primed for another shot in 2026.

item.title: Brazil, France, Croatia, Colombia to Play Pre-World Cup Friendlies in USA
item.description: Brazil will play friendlies against France and Croatia in the U.S. as it prepares for this year’s World Cup.

item.title: Agent drops ex-Huskies QB amid portal dispute

item.title: Falcons to interview ex-QB Ryan for new prez role
item.description: The Falcons will interview former franchise quarterback Matt Ryan, among others, for a new role entitled the "president of football," owner Arthur Bla...

item.title: Fins fire coach McDaniel; GM hire expected soon
item.description: The Dolphins have fired coach Mike McDaniel after Miami finished 7-10, its second straight season missing the playoffs.

item.title: Stone-faced Cignetti vows 'I am happy, at times'

item.title: Commanders corner Lattimore arrested in Ohio
